00056 /*
00057      Macro to mark classes and functions as exports/imports
00058      on Windows or to assign default or hidden visibility
00059 */
00060 
00061 #ifdef WIN32
00062 
00063 #ifdef BUILD_APP_LIB
00064 #define APP_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00065 #else
00066 #define APP_EXPORT
00067 #endif
00068 
00069 #ifdef BUILD_DLL
00070 #define EGS_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00071 #else
00072 #define EGS_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00073 #endif
00074 #define EGS_LOCAL
00075 #define APP_LOCAL
00076 
00077 #else
00078 
00079 #ifdef HAVE_VISIBILITY
00080 #ifdef BUILD_APP_LIB
00081 #define APP_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
00082 #else
00083 #define APP_EXPORT
00084 #endif
00085 #define EGS_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility ("default")))
00086 #define EGS_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility ("hidden")))
00087 #define APP_LOCAL  __attribute__ ((visibility ("hidden")))
00088 #else
00089 #define APP_EXPORT
00090 #define EGS_EXPORT
00091 #define EGS_LOCAL
00092 #define APP_LOCAL
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 #endif
00096 
00097 /*
00098       Use the following functions to print info, warnings, or to indicate
00099       a fatal error condition.
00100 typedef void (*EGS_InfoFunction)(const char *,...);
00101 extern EGS_EXPORT EGS_InfoFunction egsInformation;
00102 extern EGS_EXPORT EGS_InfoFunction egsWarning;
00103 extern EGS_EXPORT EGS_InfoFunction egsFatal;
